name: Recta Rush
description: Recta Rush, a rush of a rectangle. He faces more and more tough enemies in each step of his life. He rushes through them like a speeding meteor. Welcome to Recta Rush. Use WASD to move and Left Mouse Button(LMB) to shoot. Hold W while shooting to control the recoil. Hold Right Mouse Button to Control the time. There 5 levels total. Enjoy!
